title: QTech
description: QTech is a fully functional e-commerce platform crafted for high-performance PC hardware sales ‚Äî from GPUs and CPUs to laptops and accessories. It combines clean aesthetics, seamless user experience, secure authentication, and an advanced admin dashboard.
headingText: Everything you need for a modern, scalable, and seamless online store ‚Äî from browsing to checkout.

features.title: Product Management
features.description: Manage listings, categories, prices, and stock levels with ease using the admin dashboard.

features.title: Smart Cart System
features.description: Users can add, update, and remove items easily ‚Äî synced in real time for smooth checkout.

features.title: Secure Checkout
features.description: Protected payment flow with authentication to keep customer data and orders safe.

features.title: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Analytics, order tracking, and sales insights to help store owners stay in control.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile ‚Äî ensuring great user experience on all screens.

features.title: Advanced Search
features.description: Users can filter, sort, and find products instantly with a powerful and fast search system.

build: QTech is engineered using a robust and modern tech stack tailored for e-commerce excellence. From dynamic product displays to secure transactions and real-time admin insights, every layer of the platform is optimized for performance, usability, and scalability.
techBuild: htmll, css, javaScript, Node.js, MySql, Firebase, Figma, charts.js

title: QTech - Dashboard
description: QTech Dashboard is a powerful control panel designed for managing your e-commerce platform with ease. It allows admins to monitor store performance, view and manage customer orders, and fully control product listings ‚Äî including adding, editing, and deleting items.
overview: üõí Full product control: add, edit, or remove items easily
üìä Dashboard analytics to monitor store performance
headingText: Manage your store operations, monitor orders, and update products ‚Äî all from a powerful and intuitive dashboard.

features.title: Inventory Control
features.description: Add, edit, and delete products with full control over categories, stock levels, and prices.

features.title: Order Management
features.description: Track, review, and update order statuses with real-time visibility of customer purchases.

features.title: Sales Analytics
features.description: Visual reports and statistics on total orders, revenue, top products, and user activity.

features.title: User Access
features.description: Manage admin roles and access permissions securely and easily.

features.title: Advanced Controls
features.description: Fine-tune platform behavior, UI settings, and feature toggles directly from the dashboard.

features.title: Responsive UI
features.description: Designed to work across all devices ‚Äî desktops, tablets, and mobile screens.

build: The QTech Dashboard is built for efficiency and control. With dynamic data handling, powerful admin tools, and clear insights into store operations, it provides all the backend tools needed to keep your e-commerce platform running smoothly and efficiently.
techBuild: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, MySQL, Firebase, Charts.js

title: Athkar
description: A comprehensive Islamic app featuring Quran reading/listening, prayer times, daily Athkar (morning, evening, post-salah), a digital Tasbih, interactive quizzes, and reminder notifications ‚Äî all in a clean, modern design for a smooth spiritual experience.
overview: üìñ Seamless Quran reading and audio playback
üì± Clean and responsive UI for all devices

features.title: Daily Athkar
features.description: Morning, evening, and post-salah supplications presented in a simple and readable format.

features.title: Quran Reading & Listening
features.description: Access the full Quran with high-quality recitations and bookmarking functionality.

features.title: Prayer Time Reminders
features.description: Get notified at accurate prayer times based on your location.

features.title: Tasbih Counter
features.description: Use the digital Tasbih to keep track of your dhikr anytime, anywhere.

features.title: Islamic Quizzes
features.description: Test your knowledge on Islamic topics with interactive and educational quizzes.

build: Athkar App is built with performance and spirituality in mind. From Quran interaction to Athkar automation and accurate prayer calculations, it ensures a fluid and meaningful user journey.

title: RentRide
description: RentRide is a sleek and user-friendly mobile app designed for seamless car rentals. Whether you're booking for a weekend getaway or daily commute, it offers quick access to a wide selection of vehicles with real-time availability, secure booking, and a smooth user experience.
overview: üöó Browse and book from a range of cars
üìç GPS-based car location and pickup points
headingText: Everything you need for a smooth, flexible, and user-friendly rental experience ‚Äî from car selection to return.

features.title: Wide Car Selection
features.description: Explore a variety of cars by type, brand, or budget ‚Äî from compact models to luxury rides.

features.title: Easy Booking
features.description: Select your date, time, and location in just a few taps with real-time availability updates.

features.title: Pickup & Return Points
features.description: Find nearby pickup locations or schedule convenient drop-off points using GPS integration.

features.title: Secure Payments
features.description: Safe and encrypted payment options with instant booking confirmation.

features.title: User Profile
features.description: Manage bookings, personal details, and rental history all in one place.

features.title: Mobile-Optimized UI
features.description: Designed with mobile-first principles to ensure a smooth and intuitive user experience.

build: RentRide is built for speed, simplicity, and reliability. From real-time car availability to secure booking and intuitive navigation, it delivers a smooth rental experience tailored for Android users.
techBuild: Java, Android Studio, MySql, PHP, Firebase, Google Maps API, REST APIs

title: YummiGo
description: YummiGo is a fast, fun, and user-friendly mobile app built for effortless food ordering and local restaurant discovery. Whether you're craving street food or fine dining, it gets your meal to you hot and fresh ‚Äî fast.
overview: üçî Browse and order from top-rated restaurants
headingText: From late-night cravings to family dinners ‚Äî YummiGo delivers tasty food with speed, simplicity, and a touch of flavor.

features.title: Diverse Menu Options
features.description: Explore meals from different cuisines, restaurants, and chefs ‚Äî tailored to your taste.

features.title: Quick & Easy Ordering
features.description: Place your order in just a few taps with real-time preparation and delivery updates.

features.title: Location-Based Suggestions
features.description: Discover popular food places near you using integrated location services.

features.title: Secure Payments
features.description: Safe and encrypted payment methods for worry-free transactions.

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Save your favorites, view order history, and manage preferences easily.

features.title: Mobile-Optimized UI
features.description: Designed for a seamless experience across smartphones and tablets.

build: YummiGo is crafted with performance, speed, and convenience in mind. With real-time order tracking, intuitive UI, and a strong backend, it ensures a smooth and satisfying food journey from restaurant to doorstep.
techBuild: Java, Android Studio, MySQL, PHP, Firebase, REST APIs, Google Maps API
